content: named after my best friend s cat happy is a no-sew anthropomorphic cat doll he may not be able to stand on his own but he is adorable nonetheless all parts except for the ears are worked in the round and attached as you go while crocheting the body it is important to have the legs arms and tail done before starting on the body i personally used a 2mm crochet hook and katia capri yarn for the version of happy you can see in the pattern photos but please don t feel limited in your yarn or hook choices to bring happy to life cat dolls made with this pattern may be sold as long as credit is given in the form of a link to my shop and/or the text pattern by @kattenkvvaad on ribblr and ravelry
